snippet.title: Kingpin Reloaded - Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Kingpin: Reloaded is an enhanced re-release of the classic tale of revenge. Take control of a street gang and order your recruits to attack, defend or even do a little safe-cracking to pick up some needed cash. Use that cash to buy nastier weapons and take down your punk enemies in this intense first-person shooter.

And we are here with a release date.

Kingpin Reloaded releases on December 5th 2023.

- Wishlist Kingpin Reloaded here: https://3drealms.live/KingpinReloaded
- Follow 3D Realms on Twitter: https://3drealms.live/3DRSocial
- Join the 3D Realms Discord: https://3drealms.live/Discord
- Join the 3D Realms Subreddit: https://3drealms.live/Reddit
- https://3drealms.com/
- http://slipgate-ironworks.com
